user.title: Connect to Lutron Homeworks Controller
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Homeworks processor.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this controller
data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the processor
data_description.username: Login username if authentication is enabled
data_description.password: Login password if authentication is enabled

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate Homeworks Controller
reauth_confirm.description: The controller at {host} requires updated credentials.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Homeworks Controller
reconfigure.description: Update the connection settings for this controller.

error.connection_error: Failed to connect to controller. Check host and port.
error.duplicated_host_port: A controller with this host and port is already configured
error.duplicated_controller_id: A controller with this name already exists

init.title: Lutron Homeworks Options
init.description: Configure devices and settings for your Homeworks system.

menu_options.manage_cco_devices: Manage CCO devices (switches, lights, covers, locks)

manage_cco_devices.title: CCO Device Management
manage_cco_devices.description: CCO devices are relay-controlled outputs (switches, on/off lights, covers, locks).

manage_dimmers.title: Dimmable Light Management
manage_dimmers.description: Dimmable lights support brightness control (RPM, D48, H48, RF dimmers).

manage_keypads.title: Keypad Management
manage_keypads.description: Keypads provide button events and LED status feedback.

add_cco_device.title: Add CCO Device
add_cco_device.description: CCO devices use relay outputs. The address identifies the keypad/CCO module, and the button number identifies which relay (1-8 for CCO, 1-24 for keypads).

data_description.button_number: Relay number 1-8 for CCO modules, 1-24 for keypads
data_description.entity_type: How this device appears in Home Assistant
data_description.inverted: Swap on/off semantics (useful for normally-closed relays)

edit_cco_device.title: Edit CCO Device
edit_cco_device.description: Modify the device settings. Changing address or button will update the KLS polling.

remove_cco_device.title: Remove CCO Devices
remove_cco_device.description: Select devices to remove. Associated entities will be deleted.

add_light.title: Add Dimmable Light
add_light.description: For dimmers with brightness control. Use CCO devices for on/off-only lights.

data_description.addr: Dimmer address (varies by type: RPM, D48, H48, RF)
data_description.rate: Time in seconds to fade to new brightness level

add_keypad.title: Add Keypad
add_keypad.description: Add a keypad to receive button events and monitor LED states.

remove_keypad.title: Remove Keypads
remove_keypad.description: Select keypads to remove. All associated buttons will also be removed.

add_button.title: Add Button
add_button.description: Add a button to the keypad.

data_description.led: Enable LED state tracking for this button
data_description.release_delay: Delay in seconds before sending release event

controller_settings.title: Controller Settings
controller_settings.description: Configure protocol-level settings for this controller.

data_description.kls_poll_interval: How often to poll KLS state for CCO devices (seconds)
data_description.kls_window_offset: Starting index of the 8-button window in the 24-digit KLS string (default: 9)

import_csv.title: Import Devices from CSV
import_csv.description:
Paste CSV content with columns: device_type, address, relay/button, name.

Supported device_type values: CCO, SWITCH, LIGHT, DIMMER, COVER, LOCK

review_config.title: Current Configuration
review_config.description: Review your current device configuration. Use the other menu options to make changes.

error.duplicate_cco: This CCO address and button combination already exists
error.duplicated_number: This button number is already used on this keypad
error.invalid_csv: Invalid CSV format. Check that all required columns are present.
error.no_devices_in_csv: No valid devices found in CSV
error.no_devices: No devices configured. Add devices first.
error.no_buttons: No buttons configured on this keypad. Add buttons first.

send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Send raw command(s) to a Homeworks controller. Use 'delay X' to pause X milliseconds between commands.

controller_id.name: Controller ID
controller_id.description: The controller to send the command to

command.name: Command
command.description: Command(s) to send. Can be a single command or list of commands.
